text: John Samuel Malecela (born 19 April 1934) is a Tanzanian politician. He was Prime Minister of Tanzania from November 1990 to December 1994. He was the vice-chairman of the CCM from 1995 to 2007.Japan, Ministry for Foreign Affairs (MOFA): 28 African nations ==Reference== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Tanzania
title: John Malecela
